metadata.title: CVE-2019-19797 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description:
read_colordef in read.c in Xfig fig2dev 3.2.7b has an out-of-bounds write.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19797` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

fig2dev - 1:3.2.7b-3ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.note: mdeslaur> can't reproduce on xenial and bionic. Could reproduce on eoan.

criterions.comment: fig2dev package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.2.7b-3ubuntu1').
